11.content: And how will he grow?
11.title: Keith

choices: That night, Keith gets his first hard-on, and begins to grow as he explores it
That night, when Keith is showering, his body grows as it soaks in the water
That night, at dinner, Keith's appetite is ravenous, and he grows as he eats
111.content:
"Alright, Keith," the doctor said. "That's the last of your shots for this year. How do you feel?"

The skinny red-headed boy looked at his arm as he rubbed it. "Okay, I guess," he replied. The shots hadn't exactly been pleasant, but he remembered what his father had said: he was ten years old now, which meant he was in double-digits. He wasn't a little kid anymore, so it was past time for crying.

"Good, then I'll see you next--" The doctor stopped himself as he flipped through pages on the clipboard. "Oh, I almost forgot! There's one more injection we can do. It's optional, but it's supposed to lead to healthy development in boys your age. I just got to go grab it from the supply closet. One moment please."

Keith grimaced at the thought of another needle poking through his skin. He wondered if he could just tell the doctor not to do it; he did say it was optional, after all. But he figured that if his doctor was this positive about it, it couldn't hurt, and the pain would just be temporary. Might as well suck it up and just do it, he thought to himself. He tried to focus on something else while he waited.

A few minutes later, the doctor returned into the room holding a needle, one that looked much larger than the previous ones (or maybe that was just his imagination at work). "All right, Keith, this should be the one. Ready?"

Should? Keith thought to himself, not liking the slight hesitation in the doctor's voice, but he pushed his fear down and simply nodded. The doctor gently grabbed his arm, batted the already-tender spot where the needle was about to go in with a cotton swab wet with rubbing alcohol, and brought the tip of the needle to the skin. Closing his eyes and biting his lips, Keith braced himself, waiting for the inevitable sharp sensation of pain.

That sensation never came, though. Instead, he only felt a half-second's worth of pressure, and then nothing for several seconds. He waited, expecting that pain to come any second, until finally he heard his doctor say "All done! That didn't hurt too much, did it?"

Keith spun his head around and gawked incredulously at his arm. Sure enough, there was a red spot where the needle had gone in, but he could've sworn that he didn't feel any hint of pain there. In fact, now that he thought about it, a slight feeling of pleasure was swelling through him, one that was rather unfamiliar to him. "N-no," he stammered in reply. "That didn't hurt at all!!"

"Really?" The doctor sounded skeptical, but shrugged it off. "Well, that's certainly good news! You handled your injections like a pro, Keith. You're really growing up to be a fine young man. See you next year!" And with that, the doctor was off.

Throughout the car ride back home, Keith could feel the unusual pleasureful sensation spread throughout his body. It wasn't anything too overwhelming, and it was probably best to be ignored, he thought, but it certainly was a nice side effect of the shot, if that's what caused it, anyways. Much later that night, though, he began to realize just how significant that feeling was, and that it was only the beginning of something... big...
111.title: Medical injection?

choices: Keith gets his first hard on... before growing even bigger!
Keith decides to go for a nightly walk, naked!
Keith grows again, but his face and body slightly changes as he grows.
1112.content:
"Keith! Go take a shower!" his mother called. "It's already 8:45!"

Keith himself was currently in his room, playing a new game on his computer about a giant boy who must fight other giant boys to get even bigger.

"Aw man," Keith muttered. "Just when I grew to 75 feet..."

He relunctantly began making his way to his dresser where he began looking for clothes. As he did this, that sudden pleasuring feeling that he felt from before came back. But this time it was way stronger!

His legs buckled from the sheer bliss that wracked his body, before eventually falling to his knees. Keith let out a soft groan as he suddenly felt giddy.

However, just as soon as the feeling came it quickly vanished.

"Ugh, what was that?" Keith asked himself. "I have never felt anything like that. It felt so, good." Picking himself up, Keith quickly resumed searching for his clothes.

As he walked out of his room to the bathroom, he saw his mom by the door. Upon noticing Keith, she said, "Keith, honey. I have to go do something. I will be gone for a few hours. When I return I expect to see you in bed. Understood?"

"Yes mom." He answered.

As soon as he did, he walked into the bathroom and shut the door. Keith put his clothes on a nearby table, undressed himself, and got in the shower.

He turned on the shower, and let the nice cool water flow down his head and soak his body. However, as he was getting ready to clean himself, the pleasuring feeling from before suddenly came back with a vengance! This time, it was even stronger than before!

Keith fell into the tub, unharmed. He began to shiver from the immense feeling, this time however, it didn't go away. "It's that feeling again!" Keith exclaimed.

As Keith sat in the tub, he noticed something. His body was sliding. At first, he thought he was slipping, however he felt his feet begin to to touch the end of the tub. Then the walls on the tub began closing in on him. Looking around, Keith saw that everything in the room had begun to get smaller and smaller.

Finally, the pleasuring feeling stops, and so does his growth. After laying in the tub for a few seconds, Keith gets out of the shower, or tries to as he bumps his head. "OW!" He cries, rubbing his head. "How big am I? Wait, why am I asking myself that when I can just find out?"

Hunching towards the huge mirror in the bathroom thanks to his new size, Keith looks at himself. But the only thing he he sees is his chest. "Hmm, I've gotta be pretty big if I can't see my own face..."

Getting another idea, he hunches up to the table and grabs his clothes. Much to his surprise, and disbelief, his shirt and pants are about the size of his hand.

"Okay, this is just awesome!"

Little did Keith know, things were gonna get even bigger for him...
1112.title: Growing in the Shower

112.content: And where will He grow?
112.title: Randomly with no explained reason

choices: He Grows another boy you choose who and how
He makes the bully's life a living hell
1122.content: It seemed like a normal day for young Keith, he was having Lunch at school. Keith was happily eating his lunch until a bully who was 5'4 his size decided to flip his over. "Hey" said Keith "That's not fair" "Life isn't fair" said the bully laughing. Suddenly out of nowhere Keith's stomach rumbled loudly. Then his clothes started to feel unusually snug. Suddenly Keith began to grow, his clothes began to stretch apart as he passed 4'7. The bully was shocked, but Keith had a sly smile on his face. He passed 5 feet and his shirt ripped. The other students were so scared they turned ghost white. He passed 6 feet and his pants ripped, leaving him in a pair of blue underwear, which seemed to be growing with Keith as he was becoming a giant boy. He passed 7 feet, 8 feet, 9 feet. The other kids and staff ran out of the lunch room as Keith continued to grow. He passed 10,20, 30, 40, and stopped at 60 feet high."Now I rule this puny land" said Keith evilly. What does Keith do now?
1122.title: School

12.content: And how will he grow?
12.title: Sam

124.content:
Sam is a twelve year old boy, with his body being sort of chunky and heavy set at 130lbs, and standing at 4’6 feet tall. He was having a happy life by any means, and enjoyed so much that he got to spend some time with his family like it should. That is until six months ago, when tragedy struck!

He was at school one morning when he was informed of a terrible car crash on a highway. Sam knew his parents were heading through to go on a business, so he thinks they would be safe with an incident. But it was not the case, when his teacher told him privately that both his parents were amongst the other fatalities involved in what was later learned, was a careless, drink driving from one man. Yet, he survived at the expense of others on the highway.

This dropped Sam so hard, that he could hardly believe his parents are no more, and unable to spend some quality time together than he should get. All because of one man to blame, he also felt angry in frustration with this cause. He always wanted to take this loss and find this man some revenge, as if he needed it so badly.

Six months on, and still can’t get to terms of his loss, now that he lives alone that he needed some quiet reflection on his own. He can be seen sitting on the bench at the park, wanted to have some quiet moment for his benefit. It kinda helps sometimes, when he had bad dreams in the middle of the night, thinking about his parents he’s unable to see them again.

It was pretty common for Sam to take it easy for a while, but that was until one day when he spotted something that was laying on the ground. It was some kind of a toy gun that some kids would use, but he finds it suspicious, and picked it up to take a closer look at it. What turns out is there’s just two buttons and a trigger, which Sam begin to curious about this toy gun he’s now holding.

“Mmm... so this is the size ray gun, eh?” Sam wondered for a moment, before he shrugged and thought otherwise. “I hope someone doesn’t mind if I can have a shot at it for a while?”

That curious smile was the first since his loss to his parents, as he feels he’s been gifted to act his revenge or some sort. That may be so when he wanted to try and...
124.title: Sam Finds A Ray Gun

Leon: 8 years old, sort of chubby. Black hair and brown eyes, pale skin, 4 foot even. His parents are scientists that bring their work home with them.

Miles: 9 years old, the youngest of three brothers. His older brothers Sean [18 years old] and Ian [14 years old] like to pick on him. He has auburn hair and brown eyes, and is on the skinny/shrimpy side.

15.content:
Tony: 9 years old. 80 pounds, average height for his age, and just a small little boy, for now. He's curious, but also wants to be bigger too for fun. He has dark brown hair, and light skin.

Matthew: 11 years old, 100 pounds: shorter than average height. Matthew is a boy who is constantly bullied and harassed in high school, but now he wants revenge on those who mocked him. Has blonde hair

Max: 10 years old, 95 pounds, average height for his age: Just a kid who likes to have fun and relax, but can get carried away too. Has black hair.
15.title: Others

choices: A bright light appeared in the sky
1511.content:
Tony was getting ready for school one morning, getting his clothes on and brushing his teeth and eating breakfast and all, when on the television, a report was on the tv about strange lights spotted last night, flying over the city. He didn't pay much attention to it, knowing that aliens aren't real. The boy then shut off the tv, and told his mom good bye, and headed off to school for the day.

While walking to school, Tony thought about the news report a bit, wondering if perhaps it might even be true.. For now, he ignored it, as he walked to school, but... It wouldn't leave his mind

Just then...
1511.title: Aliens Spotted

15111.content:
Tony was shocked, and blinded from his vision as a bright light filled the sky.. It was... It was..

"Oh my gosh.." He said, at a lost for words as some sort of alien spacecraft appeared in the sky. He was too frozen to move, or to run away.. Just stare at the strange UFO... The boy just stared at it for a few moments, but then, afterwards, something truly shocking happened. The alien spacecraft shot out a beam, and it headed straight for Tony, the boy felt a strange, yet strong feeling inside of him, and before he could rationalize what happened, the UFO was... Gone
15111.title: A bright light appeared in the sky

choices: He tried to hold it in
151112.content:
Tony arrived at the school, soon enough. He ignored what happened earlier. Perhaps he was just seeing things, and maybe nothing happened. That's probably it, yeah. The young boy headed off to his first class of the day. Which was, sadly, PE. his least favorite subject. With his least favorite teacher too, Mr.Banner.

As class started, the young boy changed into his PE clothes, and got ready to start another day of PE. Today. They were doing typical warm up exercises while the teacher observed them.

While Tony was trying to do push ups.. The young boy felt a strong feeling instead of him build up.. He wasn't sure what it was, but..
151112.title: Nothing happened, for now.

choices: Decides to use his power for fun
1511121.content:
Tony tried to hold in these strange, yet empowering feelings, the young boy held his stomach, and started to moan a bit in pain.. Just then, his teacher loomed over him, and started yelling at him. He yelled at the boy for not doing his exercise, and that's why it hurts, commanding him to keep working and working...

Tony started to cry even, and ran out of the gym, locking himself outside.. His best friend ran outside too, Kyle. "Hey dude, you ok?" The 10 year old boy said. "I'm here for you, what's up?"

"I.. Feel so weird.." Tony cried out, "I think you should run.. Cause..."

Just then, Tony let out a huge roar, his skin turning green for a second. Kyle noticed that his friend was beginning to change, rapidly. The boy moaned and groaned.. His clothes starting to rip off, as he started to grow in height. Kyle only watched as his friend was half naked in his underwear, which seemed to grow with him, as he grew taller and taller, becoming a gigantic boy... Somehow!

The children and teachers from the school gazed out from their windows at the sight they were seeing, and quickly tried to evacuate the building as the monstrous child grew bigger. Children from the gym stepped outside to see the boy becoming gigantic, and even the PE teacher who had just yelled at Tony was shocked.

Tony finally stopped growing for the moment.. He was confused, but he looked down, to see the tiny people below him. He just realized, he became a 50 foot tall monster.
1511121.title: He tried to hold it in

15111211.content:
Tony loomed over his entire school, finally, he was the big guy. He was gigantic.. But how did this happen, did it have to do with the strange encounter with the aliens today.. No matter, he was all powerful, it got to his head even.

The boy noticed his friend Kyle calling out to him, he barely heard him.. But, he then grabbed his now toy sized friend, and lifted him to his shoulder. "Wow, you sure are big." The ten year old said to the colossal and half naked 9 year old. "What are you going to do now?"

Tony then grinned. At his new height and transformation, he was a all powerful being. The boy was all too gleeful, grinning down at the little people who were terrified of him. He then decided on something.

Tony turned his body, and wiggled his behind. The huge underwear clad boy suddenly, and with lots of glee, sat on the school, instantly crushing it and making it into a pile of rubble. He then...

choices: ...is as normal as he was before!
1531.content:
Max is ten years old, and he’s certainly loves having fun! He always play some things he likes, just because doing nothing can be boring for a kid his age. Of course, he would play some games with his friends and more, just to keep himself smile as such.

It was that day when he was about to head to the fancy dress party, dressed up as Godzilla, which is basically a onise in pyjamas. He couldn’t find some decent costume to wear or to meet his price he wanted to pay, but he loved Godzilla so much, he decided to go with this and have fun with some stuff.

Max also loves to impersonate as well, which for his Godzilla onise, he would pretend to like he’s roaring through the city and knocking down buildings like the creature usually does. Of course he would carried on, when there was some shinny thing coming from the sky. Max thought it was a big star like he never seen anything quite like it, but it wasn’t to be when it came closer, leaving him only but stare in confusion at that bright light.

“What’s that?” Max wondered, looking confused as to what’s going on.

He continued to look up, when he realises it was a UFO that is actually flying across the sky. This was extraordinary from Max’s part, since he never thought he can see anything real like his saucer he spotted. He could only admired for a while, when it started shooting the beam from its saucer, hitting Max in the process.

That chain reaction to the beam had caused himself to passed out, and the UFO suddenly took off as if nothing had happened. It was only minutes after it happened, when Max was starting to awake very slowly. His eyes was blurring for the moment, which prompted himself to ask in great concern, whilst still feeling shocked from the beam it struck him.

“Wha...where am I? Why did this saucer hit me?” Max had so much questions, as he seems to be worried if anything worse can happen, like adoption or any other.

But eventually, it wasn’t like that, as Max had managed to get his eyes in full vision and sits up in the middle of the road. He may seem to feel different or even see like an outside world, that’s when he realised upon looking around him in his Godzilla onise, that Max...
1531.title: UFO hits Max

Damien: 11 years old, 250lbs. He’s classed as obese, because of how much he loves eating so much food, he doesn’t wanna stop there. Even when his parents tried their best when convincing a blonde haired, boy to stop.

Lewis: 9 years old, 83 pounds. He’s a child actor, working in numerous projects he’s done in both film and TV. His Dad is his agent, and so he would always wanted to bring some ideas to give his son an impression. He had black hair, and caucasian skin.

1541.content: You choose Damien to grow bigger. Now how would an obese kid grow such bigger by feeding his way through the city?
1541.title: Damien

15412.content:
This is Damien! He’s the eleven year old boy, and lives with his parents and no siblings. He has blonde hair with cute looks, and he simply enjoying life by any means, even when it’s eating lots of food he’s enjoyed the most. That’s the reason why he’s so obese, he weighs at only 250lbs!

He had his love for food, so much so that he simply liked the flavours of junk foods and meats to fill himself up. However despite he had grown fatter with his shirt gotten so tighter, which caused his fat belly to see underneath, Damien doesn’t seem to phased from it, since it’s these delicious foods that kept himself going.

However, it wouldn’t be that easy if it wasn’t for a challenge set by his parents. Obviously concerned about their son’s weight gain, they tried to convince him to stop and look after his own body, but even Damien tries at least, it’s the food that got himself distracted, and couldn’t help but gorge it so much more to have his stomach filled.

It was someday when Damien had to walk to the shops, since his parents think it’s better to burn off the fat than get in the car. Of course, it was a challenge for Damien to give, but of course his mind about food became his number one priority. He was about to walk into the store, when he spotted a vending machine that caught his eye.

What he saw, was some brand new bottle of soda, which he has never seen like it before. Even he couldn’t remember if it was advertised or not, but whatever the case, Damien couldn’t help but shrugged it off, and wants to give it a try. So he paid into the machine, and got the bottle out to pick up, and get a closer look to the soda itself.

“Hmm... I’ve never seen a soda like this before. I’m sure hope I’ll give it a try though, because I’m so thirsty!” Damien says, since he felt his mouth rather dry for the moment.

So he wasted no time but to open the top cap of the bottle, and takes a sip to give it a taste. That’s when he had that surprised expression and felt a satisfying taste of that drink. Of course with him nodding his approval, Damien takes another drink, as he would chug down...
15412.title: Damien finds a brand new soda

1542.content: You chose Lewis to get bigger, but how does it happen, when his Dad gives him a surprise filming project for his son?
1542.title: Lewis

15421.content:
Lewis is a nine year old, child actor, and he’s been doing this for a number of years. He had been famous being in these roles, both on TV and on Film, but is yet to star in the main role, until now with his latest project was eventually his Dad’s idea.

His father named David, is not only Lewis’ father but he’s also an agent to a nine year old, so he would always gave Lewis an opportunity to give these roles a try and experience what it’s like to act right in front of the cameras. Of course David knows his son is always nervous when the planes project is on, but even when the youngster is about to star in his main role of movie, David would be making sure he gets Lewis some composure before going out to make the impression.

It was the first day of filming, and Lewis already knows what roles he’s going to be. It’s the film parodied by ‘Attack of the 50 Foot Woman’, but with a boy being in the centre of the attention. He liked that idea, and thought he was gonna get some miniature buildings or special effects to look like he’s a giant indeed. But what he doesn’t know is that the directors and his Dad wanted to make Lewis a giant, like for real, by using a ray gun!

The main reason for this is because they don’t wanna use any scenes that many viewers branded this a fake, and non-existent. Their aim is to try and make this a reality and it will be the first time to make any person like Lewis a giant for real, just so they wanted to surprise everyone all over.

Obviously, they wouldn’t want to tell Lewis until the filming process, as they wanted to make the scene...
15421.title: Lewis’ Surprise Scene

1543.content: You chose Geoffrey to get bigger, but how did the bookworm gotten so huge, when his science project had gone wrong?
1543.title: Geoffrey

info.brief_description: You control a shota as he grows and expands in a ever shrinking world!
info.description:
Alright here is my third addition to writing.com Here in this story you can control a shota that will grow and grow and grow. It's a fairly simple concept so here i will just leave some rules.

Try to use decent grammar and spelling, one mistake will not get your addition deleted but i would prefer that it not be text talk or anything like that.

No women what so ever

Obviously the shota will be Gay

Please no short additions except for choice chapters

Have fun!

PS Will gift up to five hundred points per chapter if they are good
info.pretty_title: Attack of the giant shota boy!
